sourceString: about how long have these symptoms been going on?
targetString: obubonero buno bumaze nga bbanga ki?
translated: nga obubonero buno bumaze bbanga ki?

sourceString: and all chest pain should be treated this way especially with your age
targetString: era obulumi bwonna obw’omukifuba bulina kujjanjabibwa mu ngeri eno naddala okusinziira ku myaka gyo
translated: era obulumi bwonna mu kifuba olina okubujjanjaba bw’otyo naddala ng’olina emyaka gyo

sourceString: and also needs to be checked your cholesterol blood pressure
targetString: era kyetaagisa okukeberebwa ekirungo ky’obutafaali okumanya puleesa y’omusaayi
translated: era era yeetaaga okukeberebwa puleesa yo eya kolesterol

sourceString: and are you having a fever now?
targetString: era olina olusujja mu kiseera kino?
